cabotage.translation[0].definitions[0].d: laws that allow ships, aircraft, or road vehicles to collect and move goods or passengers within a foreign country or to another country
cabotage.translation[0].definitions[0].e: an agreement which extended the rights of cabotage by road haulage firms in other EU member countries
cabotage.translation[0].definitions[1].d: the movement of ships from one port to another along the coast, usually within the same country
